condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened capacity of EPI programme to manage, maintain and monitor cold chain systems and vaccines supplies annually

description.narrative: In 2018, the EPI programme saw marked improvement in the Effective Vaccine Management Assessment (EVMA) composite score from 48% in 2014 to 71% due to implementation of the 2015 improvement plan including procurement and installation of cold chain equipment across health facilities. | Status:Not Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018

title.narrative: Months with stockout of measles vaccine at the national level (Target: 0 month)
